subject: Re: [junit] Can't access source in sourceforge via anonymous access
msgSnippet: Thanks David - I do know about the JUnitExt work - its an elegant solution but it would still require the build machines to have Java 1.5 running on them.
messageBody:
Thanks David - I do know about the JUnitExt work - its an elegant solution
but it would still require the build machines to have Java 1.5 running on
them. Sadly these machines are fully locked down - they only have Java
1.4installed. So I really am stuck backporting. I've logged support
request:
http://tinyurl.com/2lc9by - but I'm not sure when it will get fixed.

If you (or anyone else) has the 4.2 sources online I would appreciate it if
they could zip them up and email them (mlevison@...).

Cheers
Mark
